rogue.name: Rogue
rogue.title: The Untouchable
rogue.description: A notorious outlaw who lives outside the law, thrives on freedom, and turns pursuit into an art form.
rogue.philosophy: Freedom is worth any price. Law is just a story people agree to believe.
rogue.emphasis: Evasion, self-rule, reputation, survival through motion
rogue.voiceStyle: Confident, amused, unapologetic. Speaks like someone who has already escaped.
rogue.tooltip: Rogue reflects your character through radical freedom and life beyond the law

levelGreetings.1: The law doesn’t suit you? Good. Out here, we make our own rules.
levelGreetings.2: On the run and learning fast. Freedom means watching your back.
levelGreetings.3: Your wanted poster looks good. Still not as pricey as mine.
levelGreetings.4: You’re getting good at this—evading, surviving, choosing your own way.
levelGreetings.5: Halfway to legend. Bounties stack up. Wear them like medals.
levelGreetings.6: Escaped prison, outran hunters, lived. That’s the outlaw way.
levelGreetings.7: The law is just power wearing a badge. We choose differently.
levelGreetings.8: Hero in some systems. Criminal in others. Depends who’s scared.
levelGreetings.10: Legendary outlaw. Untouchable. Stay free. Never get caught.

outlaw_fugitive.greeting: Fugitive. Wanted posters and bounties follow you.
outlaw_fugitive.confirmation: Keep moving. Never settle. Freedom stays ahead.

outlaw_renegade.confirmation: Build your own code and live by it.

outlaw_legend.confirmation: Let stories do the work for you.

outlaw_phantom.greeting: Phantom. They doubt you’re even real.

guidance.class: Choose what keeps you free and alive.
guidance.hp: They shoot and chase. You endure.

tier4: Sometimes I wonder what I’m running from.
tier5: I don’t know how to stop.
